description:
Lead Fullstack / Frontend Engineer - Hybrid / Fully Remote within the US
Competitive salary based on experience (up to $250K).
Candidates must be physically present and legally authorized to work in the US.
Benefits:
Equity
Medical, Dental, Life and Disability Insurance
Matching 401(k)
Unlimited PTO
Company:
The company is a leading software solutions provider headquartered in California with offices across the US and Europe. It has an excellent reputation and works with the likes of Google, Tesla and Boeing.
Function:
In this role, you will lead a full-stack team responsible for innovating, building, evolving, and maintaining a suite of proprietary products that will help accelerate our roadmap.
Key Responsibilities:
Design, implement, modify and test engaging, consumer-facing web experiences
Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to scope and deliver valuable projects on time
Teach and learn new skills with your fellow developers, producing quality code with consistent standards
Continually look for opportunities to build value in the codebase: set standards, build tools, and automate jobs to make yourself and your team better and faster
Experience:
This individual will be a technical leader
6+ years of experience in web development
5+ years of experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript
5+ years of experience in at least 2 of the following: React, Angular, Vue, Node or Python
If your experience doesn’t exactly match the qualifications listed, we still want to hear from you as we’re hiring for several roles!
We’re partnering with Tech DNA to improve the application process and candidate experience.
Job Type: Full-time
Pay: $200,000.00 - $250,000.00 per year
Benefits:
401(k)
401(k) matching
Dental insurance
Employee assistance program
Employee discount
Flexible schedule
Flexible spending account
Health insurance
Health savings account
Life insurance
Paid time off
Parental leave
Professional development assistance
Referral program
Relocation assistance
Retirement plan
Tuition reimbursement
Vision insurance
Schedule:
Monday to Friday
Supplemental pay types:
Bonus pay
Signing bonus
Work Location: Remote
Show Less
Report
title: Lead Full Stack Engineer
